Description: Ostracon, fragment of the body of a red-brown pottery ribbed vessel, the fabric is partially grey in section, the interior is covered with a dark-brown resinous deposit, one edge appears to have suffered fire damage, exterior covered with a brown slip and faint traces of perhaps six lines of black-painted demotic text.
Bibliographic references: Trismegistos / An interdisciplinary portal of papyrological and epigraphic resources (393774) (http://www.trismegistos.org/text/393774)
